entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the main character in the story. He is mentioned by Ginny and is shown to be actively participating in the scene, sprinting after Snape and Malfoy.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is introduced as a character who is concerned about Harry's whereabouts. She asks him where he came from but does not get an answer.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone who must be caught by Harry. He is shown to be escaping and is the target of Harry's pursuit.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone who ran past with Snape. He is described as an enormous blond Death Eater.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is introduced as a character who is lying on the floor and clutching his stomach. He is shown to be concerned about Harry's safety.

entities.name: alecto
entities.description: Alecto is introduced as a female Death Eater who is sprinting away down the corridor with her brother behind her.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as someone who shouted 'Take that!' and is shown to be actively participating in the scene.

relationships.description: Harry is pursuing Snape, who must not escape. This relationship is described as Harry sprinting after Snape and trying to catch up with him.
Harry is also pursuing Malfoy, who ran past with Snape. This relationship is not explicitly described but can be inferred from the context.
Neville is concerned about Harry's safety and is lying on the floor clutching his stomach. This relationship is described as Neville muttering to himself that Snape and Malfoy ran past.
Alecto and her brother are mentioned as siblings who are sprinting away down the corridor together. This relationship is described as Alecto's brother being right behind her.
